MP3 module for JHOVE (draft, 4-April-2007)

Module: MP3-MnH
Version: 1.1h
Author: Mansoor-Hammassa Ismail
License: GNU Lesser General Public License, version 2
Class: ham.mas.sa.jhove.Mp3Module
Requires: Java ID3 Tag Library (SourceForge)
File types: MPEG audio layer 3 (MP3) files.

Please note that this module is unsupported by HUL, and that you use it at your own risk.
